PSA Time is an application designed exclusively for monitoring and organizing information related to PSA (Prostate Specific Antigen). This application does not perform diagnosis, does not replace medical consultation, and does not offer clinical recommendations.


The values, alerts, risk ranges, and analyses presented in PSA Time are informative and educational, serving only as support for personal prostate health monitoring. Any health-related decision must always be made in conjunction with a doctor or urologist, a professional qualified to interpret exams, symptoms, and clinical history.


The user is solely responsible for the information entered in the application, as well as for the decisions made based on the displayed data. PSA Time does not collect, transmit, or share information without user consent, and all data entered is the sole responsibility of the user on their device.


By using the app, you agree that:
 • You recognize that PSA Time does not provide medical opinion.
 • You understand that results, charts, and alerts are informative estimates.
 • You assume full responsibility for the information registered and the use of the generated data.
 • You agree to seek medical attention whenever there is doubt, alteration, or concern.
 • You accept that the application may be updated, modified, or discontinued without prior notice.


If you do not agree with these terms, do not proceed with the use of the application.
